resources.string: Tuma skrini ya kifaa chako kwenye monita za nje
Vuta chini ili ufikie Kituo cha udhibiti, washa tuma skrini, kisha utafute vifaa vilivyo karibu.

You can project items from your Xiaomi tablet on most Xiaomi TV models with Bluetooth capabilities without turning on Miracast manually. If you need to turn on Miracast, press the [MENU] button and start casting by using the option for other Android phones.
Tuma skrini ya mawasilisho kwenye TV yako huku ukibadilisha slaidi na kuangalia maelezo kutoka kwenye kifaa chako.
Tuma skrini ya michezo kutoka kwenye kifaa chako hadi kwenye TV yako.
